description:
Note: This is the latest course updated in April 2016.Google maps is an invaluable tool on your desktop and smartphone.So,don't just view maps,let's build them!

Google is aiming to improve that with a new update to Google Maps.With the Google Maps API, you can add maps based on Google Maps data to your website or application. The company announced Tuesday that it’s bringing a handful of useful new features to Google Maps that make it more functional without an Internet connection.Whether you need directions or just need to find a location, it’s pretty hard to escape Google Maps on a day-to-day basis.Instead of just using Maps to get from A-B, We will guide you through the Google Maps API, while you build a live tracking interactive map.

This course is designed to make it easy for everyone to build a Google Map Clone. It has been divided in to following main sections :

  1. Create the API
  2. Basics
  3. Options
  4. Methods 
  5. Events

This amazing Course will help you quickly master all the difficult concepts and will the learning will be a breeze. 

Let's get started.
title: Learn to Add Google Maps API to your Website & Apps
